}> // Array of validation errors if any\n// }\n\nconst name = (textInputName.value || '').trim();\nconst address = (textInputAddress.value || '').trim();\nconst contact = (textInputContactNumber.value (firstField === 'contact') textInputContactNumber.focus();else\n if (firstField === 'email') textInputEmail.focus();\n\n utils.showNotification({\n title: 'Validation error',\n description: 255, 255, 0.04);\n --panel-strong: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);\n --border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);\n --ink: #e6eef7;\n --muted: #94a3b8;\n --accent: #0ea5e9;\n --accent-strong: #0284c7;\n --accent-warm: #f59e0b;\n --radius: 14px;\n}\n\nhtml, body, .retool-portal, .retool-root {\n font-family: 'Space Grotesk', 'Manrope', 'Inter', system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif;\n background: var(--bg-1);\n color: var(--ink);\n min-height: 100vh;\n}\n\n/* Layout + cards */\n.retool-widget, .retool-container, .ant-card {\n background: var(--panel);\n border: 1px solid var(--border);\n border-radius: var(--radius);\n box-shadow: none;\n backdrop-filter: none;\n}\n\n.retool-widget-title, .ant-card-head-title {\n letter-spacing: 0.4px;\n text-transform: uppercase;\n font-weight: 700;\n color: var(--accent);\n}\n\n.retool-section, .retool-row, .ant-card-body {\n padding: 14px 16px;\n}\n\n/* Buttons */\n.ant-btn-primary,\n.retool-btn-primary {\n background: var(--accent);\n border: none;\n color: #f8fbff;\n border-radius: calc(var(--radius) - 4px);\n font-weight: 700;\n}\n\n.ant-btn-primary:hover,\n.retool-btn-primary:hover {\n background: var(--accent-strong);\n color: #fff;\n}\n\n.ant-btn-default,\n.retool-btn-secondary {\n background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);\n border: 1px solid var(--border);\n color: var(--ink);\n border-radius: calc(var(--radius) - 6px);\n}\n\n.ant-btn-default:hover,\n.retool-btn-secondary:hover {\n border-color: var(--accent);\n color: #fff;\n}\n\n/* Form controls */\n.ant-input,\n.ant-select-selector,\n.ant-picker,\n.ant-input-affix-wrapper,\n.ant-input-number,\n.ant-input-number-input {\n background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06) !important;\n border: 1px solid var(--border) !important;\n color: var(--ink) !important;\n border-radius: calc(var(--radius) - 6px) !important;\n box-shadow: none;\n transition: border-color 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease;\n}\n\n.ant-input:focus,\n.ant-select-focused .ant-select-selector,\n.ant-picker-focused,\n.ant-input-affix-wrapper-focused,\n.ant-input-number-focused {\n border-color: var(--accent) !important;\n box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(14, 165, 233, 0.25) !important;\n}\n\n.ant-input::placeholder,\n.ant-select-selection-placeholder {\n color: var(--muted) !important;\n}\n\n/* Tables */\n.ant-table-wrapper {\n background: transparent;\n}\n\n.ant-table {\n background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);\n border-radius: var(--radius);\n overflow: hidden;\n}\n\n.ant-table-thead > tr > th {\n background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;\n color: var(--ink);\n border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border);\n text-transform: uppercase;\n letter-spacing: 0.3px;\n}\n\n.ant-table-tbody > tr > td {\n border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);\n}\n\n.ant-table-tbody > tr:hover > td {\n background: rgba(14, 165, 233, 0.08) !important;\n}\n\n/* Tags and pills */\n.ant-tag, .retool-tag {\n border-radius: 999px;\n padding: 4px 10px;\n font-weight: 700;\n border: none;\n color: #0b1021;\n background: #e2e8f0;\n}\n\n/* Modal + drawers */\n.ant-modal-content, .ant-drawer-content {\n background: var(--panel-strong);\n border: 1px solid var(--border);\n border-radius: var(--radius);\n box-shadow: none;\n color: var(--ink);\n}\n\n/* Inputs grouped as cards */\n.retool-form, .ant-form-item {\n margin-bottom: 12px;\n}\n\n.retool-form .ant-form-item-label > label {\n color: var(--muted);\n letter-spacing: 0.2px;\n}\n\n/* Hero banner for page headers */\n.page-hero {\n padding: 18px 22px;\n border-radius: var(--radius);\n background: var(--panel-strong);\n color: var(--ink);\n font-weight: 700;\n box-shadow: none;\n}\n\n.page-hero small {\n color: var(--muted);\n font-weight: 500;\n}\n\n/* Compact cards for stats */\n.stat-card {\n padding: 14px 16px;\n border-radius: var(--radius);\n background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);\n border: 1px solid var(--border);\n box-shadow: none;\n}\n\n.stat-card .label {\n color: var(--muted);\n font-size: 12px;\n letter-spacing: 0.3px;\n}\n\n.stat-card .value {\n font-size: 26px;\n font-weight: 700;\n color: #f8fafc;\n}\n\n/* Table actions row spacing */\n.table-actions {\n display: flex;\n gap: 10px;\n align-items: center;\n}\n\n/* Mobile tweaks */\n@media (max-width: 768px) {\n .retool-row {\n flex-direction: column;\n gap: 12px;\n }\n .page-hero {\n padding: 14px 16px;\n 'normal');\n const wrapped = doc.splitTextToSize(val, usableWidth / 2 - 4);\n doc.text(wrapped, x + 28, currentY);\n const lines = Array.isArray(wrapped) ? wrapped.length : 1;\n return currentY +
